verses.verse: Now it happened, <S%H2346><s%> when the wall was built, <S%H1129><s%> and I had set up <S%H5975><s%> the doors, <S%H1817><s%> and the porters <S%H7778><s%> and the singers <S%H7891><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were appointed, <S%H6485><s%>

that I put my brother <S%H251><s%> Hanani, <S%H2607><s%> and Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the governor <S%H8269><s%> of the castle, <S%H1002><s%> in charge <S%H6680><s%> of Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> for he was a faithful <S%H571><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and feared <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H430><s%> above many. <S%H376><s%>

I said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H8179><s%> "Don't let the gates of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> be opened <S%H6605><s%> until the sun <S%H8121><s%> is hot; <S%H2527><s%> and while they stand guard, <S%H5975><s%> let them shut <S%H1479><s%> the doors, <S%H1817><s%> and you bar <S%H270><s%> them: <S%H5975><s%> and appoint watches <S%H4931><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> in his watch, <S%H4929><s%> with everyone <S%H376><s%> near his house. <S%H1004><s%>"

Now the city <S%H5892><s%> was wide <S%H7342><s%> and large; <S%H7342><s%> but the people <S%H5971><s%> were few <S%H4592><s%> therein, <S%H8432><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> were not built. <S%H1129><s%>

My God <S%H430><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> into my heart <S%H3820><s%> to gather together <S%H6908><s%> the nobles, <S%H2715><s%> and the rulers, <S%H5461><s%> and the people, <S%H5971><s%> that they might be reckoned by genealogy. <S%H3187><s%> I found <S%H4672><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%> of the genealogy <S%H3187><s%> of those who came up <S%H5927><s%> at the first, <S%H7223><s%> and I found <S%H4672><s%> written therein: <S%H3789><s%>

These are the children <S%H1121><s%> of the province, <S%H4082><s%> who went up <S%H5927><s%> out of the captivity <S%H7628><s%> of those who had been carried away, <S%H1473><s%> whom Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had carried away, <S%H1540><s%> and who returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and to Judah, <S%H3063><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> to his city; <S%H5892><s%>

who came <S%H935><s%> with Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> Jeshua, <S%H3442><s%> Nehemiah, <S%H5166><s%> Azariah, <S%H5838><s%> Raamiah, <S%H7485><s%> Nahamani, <S%H5167><s%> Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> Bilshan, <S%H1114><s%> Mispereth, <S%H4559><s%> Bigvai, <S%H902><s%> Nehum, <S%H5149><s%> Baanah. <S%H1196><s%> The number <S%H4557><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of the people <S%H582><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Parosh, <S%H6551><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> - two. <S%H8147><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah, <S%H8203><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> - two. <S%H8147><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Arah, <S%H733><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> - two. <S%H8147><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Pahathmoab, <S%H6355><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3442><s%> and Joab, <S%H3097><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighteen. <S%H8083><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Elam, <S%H5867><s%> one thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> - four. <S%H702><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Zattu, <S%H2240><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> - five. <S%H2568><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Bebai, <S%H893><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> - eight. <S%H8083><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Adonikam, <S%H140><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> - seven. <S%H7651><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Hashum, <S%H2828><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> Twenty <S%H6242><s%> - eight. <S%H8083><s%>

The men <S%H582><s%> of Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Geba, <S%H1387><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> - one. <S%H259><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Lod, <S%H3850><s%> Hadid, <S%H2307><s%> and Ono, <S%H207><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> - one. <S%H259><s%>

The singers: <S%H7891><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph, <S%H623><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> - eight. <S%H8083><s%>

the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reaiah, <S%H7211><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Rezin, <S%H7526><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Nekoda, <S%H5353><s%>
the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gazzam, <S%H1502><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Uzza, <S%H5798><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Paseah. <S%H6454><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Besai, <S%H1153><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Meunim, <S%H4586><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Nephushesim, <S%H5300><s%>

the children <S%H1121><s%> of Barkos, <S%H1302><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Temah, <S%H8547><s%>
the children <S%H1121><s%> of Neziah, <S%H5335><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Hatipha. <S%H2412><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%>'s servants: <S%H5650><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Sotai, <S%H5479><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Sophereth, <S%H5618><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Perida, <S%H6514><s%>
the children <S%H1121><s%> of Jaala, <S%H3279><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Darkon, <S%H1874><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Giddel, <S%H1435><s%>

the children <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah, <S%H8203><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Hattil, <S%H2411><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Pochereth Hazzebaim, <S%H6380><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Amon. <S%H526><s%>

All the Nethinim, <S%H5411><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%>'s servants, <S%H5650><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> - two. <S%H8147><s%>

These were those who went up <S%H5927><s%> from Tel Melah, <S%H8528><s%> Tel Harsha, <S%H8521><s%> Cherub, <S%H3743><s%> Addon, <S%H114><s%> and Immer; <S%H564><s%> but they could <S%H3201><s%> not show <S%H5046><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> nor their seed, <S%H2233><s%> whether they were of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Delaiah, <S%H1806><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Nekoda, <S%H5353><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> - two. <S%H8147><s%>

Of the priests: <S%H3548><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Hobaiah, <S%H2252><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Hakkoz, <S%H6976><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Barzillai, <S%H1271><s%> who took <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Barzillai <S%H1271><s%> the Gileadite, <S%H1569><s%> and was called <S%H7121><s%> after their name. <S%H8034><s%>

These searched <S%H1245><s%> for their geneological <S%H3187><s%> records, <S%H3791><s%> but couldn't <S%H4672><s%> find them. <S%H1351><s%> Therefore were they deemed polluted and put from the priesthood. <S%H3550><s%>

The governor <S%H8660><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H398><s%> that they should not eat of the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things, <S%H6944><s%> until there stood <S%H5975><s%> up a priest <S%H3548><s%> with Urim <S%H224><s%> and Thummim. <S%H8550><s%>
The whole assembly <S%H6951><s%> together <S%H259><s%> was forty <S%H702><s%> - two thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty, <S%H8346><s%>

besides their male servants <S%H519><s%> and their female servants, <S%H519><s%> of whom there were seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> - seven: <S%H7651><s%> and they had two hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> - five <S%H2568><s%> singing men <S%H7891><s%> and singing women. <S%H7891><s%>

Their horses <S%H5483><s%> were seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> - six; <S%H8337><s%> their mules, <S%H6505><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> - five; <S%H2568><s%>

their camels, <S%H1581><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> - five; <S%H2568><s%> their donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty. <S%H6242><s%>

Some from among the heads <S%H7218><s%> of <S%H7117><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%>' households gave <S%H5414><s%> to the work. <S%H4399><s%> The governor <S%H8660><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to the treasury <S%H214><s%> one thousand <S%H505><s%> darics <S%H1871><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> basins, <S%H4219><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%>' garments. <S%H3801><s%>

Some of the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' households gave <S%H5414><s%> into the treasury <S%H214><s%> of the work <S%H4399><s%> twenty <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H7239><s%> darics <S%H1871><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and two thousand <S%H7239><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> minas <S%H4488><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

That which the rest <S%H7611><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> was twenty <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H7239><s%> darics <S%H1871><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and two thousand <S%H7239><s%> minas <S%H4488><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and sixty <S%H8346><s%> - seven <S%H7651><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%>' garments. <S%H3801><s%>

So the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and the porters, <S%H7778><s%> and the singers, <S%H7891><s%> and some of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and the Nethinim, <S%H5411><s%> and all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in their cities. <S%H5892><s%> When the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> had come, <S%H5060><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were in their cities. <S%H5892><s%>
